sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"征服，战胜"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: conquer, overcome, overthrow, defeat, beat, subdue
means: conquer ： 侧重战胜和控制。书面用词。
overcome ： 多指战胜或克服非物质的东西，如困难和不良习惯等。语气较弱也可指在斗争或竞争中战胜或压倒对方。
overthrow ： 指彻底击败对手，使其丧失力量和地位。
defeat ： 普通用词，多指在战争、比赛、竞选或辩论中战胜对手，侧重胜利的暂时性。
beat ： 口笔语均可用，可与defeat换用。
subdue ： 正式用词，与conquer同义，但强调失败后的臣服状态；也可用作借喻，表克制、压抑感情、欲望等。

sentence.Network_en: Troops were called in to subdue the rebels.
sentence.Network_cn: 军队被调来镇压反叛者。

sentence.Network_en: She tried to subdue her anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 她尽力压制自己的怒火.

sentence.Network_en: Senior government officials admit they have not been able to subdue the rebels.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府高级官员承认他们还没能制服反叛者。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... select 选出 subdue 征服；减轻 subjugate 镇压；征服.
英语六级词汇笔记 - 豆丁网 ... under subconscious 潜意识的 subdue 压制征服 sublime 庄严的崇高的.
掌中宝里以s开头的英文单词_百度知道 ... sturdy  a 强健的 subdue  vt 芝罘，克制 subscribe  vi 订购，订阅，预订.
镇字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 镇反〖 suppresscounterrevolutionaries〗 镇服〖 subdue〗 镇唬〖 frighten〗.

list.abs: subdued topography 平坦地形subdued uplift 平缓隆起；平坦地形subdued 平缓的
subduction zone 俯冲带subdued mountains 平坦山subequatorial belts 副赤道带
subdeterminant 子(行列)式subdued light 柔光subepitaxial 亚外延的
subduction zone 俯冲带subdued mountain 贤的山subfacies 亚相

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French suduire, from Latin subducere, literally 'draw from below'

entry.def: If soldiers or the police subdue a group of people, they defeat them or bring them under control by using force.

example.ex: Senior government officials admit they have not been able to subdue the rebels.
example.tran: 政府高级官员承认他们还没能制服反叛者。

entry.def: To subdue feelings means to make them less strong.

example.ex: He forced himself to subdue and overcome his fears.
example.tran: 他强迫自己克制并战胜恐惧心理。

means.word_mean: 1. put down by force or intimidation;

sentences.sentence: "The government quashes any attempt of an uprising"
"China keeps down her dissidents very efficiently"
"The rich landowners subjugated the peasants working the land"

means.word_mean: 2. to put down by force or authority;
4. get on top of; deal with successfully;

sentences.sentence: "Our wishes have to be subordinated to that of our ruler"

auth_sentence.content: Smoke is used to subdue,...bees...when taking and hiving a swarm.
auth_sentence.res_content: Smoke is used to subdue,...bees...when taking and hiving a swarm.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Smoke is used to subdue,...bees...when taking and hiving a swarm.

auth_sentence.content: The hatchet...he...uses to subdue recalcitrant sculpture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The hatchet...he...uses to subdue recalcitrant sculpture.

auth_sentence.content: We have seen the railroad and the telegraph subdue our enormous geography.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have seen the railroad and the telegraph subdue our enormous geography.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have seen the railroad and the telegraph subdue our enormous geography.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面,次一等,副手+dean教长→n.副助理监督, 副助理主教
sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带
sub下面+way道路→n.地道,地铁
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻

means.word_mean: 征服; 克制;制服;征服;控制

sentences.en: The country was subdued by the enemy.
sentences.cn: 这个国家被敌人征服了。

sentences.en: She tried to subdue her anger.
sentences.cn: 她尽力压制自己的怒火。

sentences.en: His soothing words subdued her fears.
sentences.cn: 他的安慰话减轻了她的恐惧。
